    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120626</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Položaji in tokovi v žicah za silo nič</string>
            <string language="en">Wire Configurations for a Net Force of Zero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitung Konfigurationen für eine Nettokraft von 
null</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Configurations de fil une force nette de zéro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Configurações do fio para uma força líquida 
de zero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Configurazioni del legare per una forza netta di 
zero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαμορφώσεις καλωδίων για μια δύναμη δικτύου μηδενός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Configuraciones del alambre para una fuerza neta 
de cero</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv toka v vodnikih na medsebojne sile.</string>
            <string language="en">The effect of current in the wire on the forces applied between wires.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amperov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">ampere's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzajemno učinkovanje</string>
            <string language="en">mutual interaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Effekt des Stromes in der Leitung auf den 
Kräften aufgewendet zwischen Leitungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet du courant dans le fil sur les forces 
appliquées entre les fils.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito da corrente no fio nas forças aplicadas
entre fios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto della corrente nel legare sulle forze 
applicate fra i legare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση του ρεύματος στο καλώδιο στις δυνάμεις που 
εφαρμόζονται μεταξύ των καλωδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto de la corriente en el alambre en las 
fuerzas aplicadas entre los alambres.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Amperes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gegenseitige Interaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi de l'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interaction mutuelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interação mútua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge dell'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interazione reciproca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος αμπέρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αμοιβαία αλληλεπίδραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del amperio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interacción mutua</string>
          </keyword>
